Package org.locationtech.geowave.core.store.adapter.statistics

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    DataStatisticsSet<T,R,S,SB extends StatisticsQueryBuilder<S,SB>,RB extends StatisticsQueryBuilder<R,RB>>  
    DataStatisticsStore
    This is responsible for persisting data statistics (either in memory or to disk depending on the implementation).
    InternalDataStatistics<T,R,B extends StatisticsQueryBuilder<R,B>>  
    StatisticsProvider<T>
    This interface defines the set of statistics to capture for a specific adapter.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractDataStatistics<T,R,B extends StatisticsQueryBuilder<R,B>>  
    BaseStatisticsQueryBuilder<R>  
    BaseStatisticsType<R>  
    CountDataStatistics<T>  
    DataStatisticsBuilder<T,R,B extends StatisticsQueryBuilder<R,B>>  
    DefaultFieldStatisticVisibility<T>
    This assigns the visibility of the key-value with the most-significant field bitmask (the first fields in the bitmask are the indexed fields, and all indexed fields should be the default visibility which should be the minimal set of visibility contraints of any field)
    DuplicateEntryCount<T>  
    EmptyStatisticVisibility<T>
    Supplies not additional visibility
    FieldNameStatisticVisibility<T>  
    FieldStatisticsQueryBuilder<R>  
    FieldStatisticsType<R>  
    FixedBinNumericStatistics<T>
    Fixed number of bins for a histogram.
    IndexStatisticsQueryBuilder<R>  
    IndexStatisticsType<R>  
    MaxDuplicatesStatistics<T>  
    NumericRangeDataStatistics<T,B extends StatisticsQueryBuilder<org.apache.commons.lang3.Range<Double>,B>>  
    PartitionStatistics<T>
    This class is responsible for maintaining all unique Partition IDs that are being used within a dataset.
    PartitionStatisticsQueryBuilder<R>  
    PartitionStatisticsType<R>  
    RowRangeHistogramStatistics<T>
    Dynamic histogram provide very high accuracy for CDF and quantiles over the a numeric attribute.
    RowRangeHistogramStatisticsSet<T>
    This class really just needs to get ingest callbacks and collect individual RowRangeHistogramStatistics per partition.
    StatisticsId  
    StatisticsImpl<R>  
    StatisticsQueryBuilderImpl<R,B extends StatisticsQueryBuilder<R,B>>  
    StatisticsQueryBuilderImpl.QueryByStatisticsTypeFactoryImpl  
    StatisticsType<R,B extends StatisticsQueryBuilder<R,B>>
    This is a marker class extending ByteArrayId that additionally provides type checking with a generic.
    StatsCompositionTool<T>
    This tool does not react to callbacks if the provided statistics store is null or the provided data adapter does not implement DataStatisticsStore.
